text: The Haberman Educational Foundation is a not-for-profit foundation chartered in 1994 in accordance with the research of Martin Haberman for selecting the best teachers and principals for the children and youth of America. Delia Stafford-Johnson is the President and CEO. She travels throughout the United States to conduct seminars and train teachers and principals in all public school districts. ==External links== *The Haberman Educational Foundation Category:Educational foundations in the United States
title: The Haberman Educational Foundation
